- DON'T MAKE ANY NEW DOCUMENTATION FILES PLEASE ONLY UPDATE EXISTING DOCUMENTATION FILES LOCATED AT README.MD AND IN DOCS/
- ALWAYS CHECK OFF AND UPDATE TASKS TO TODO.TXT WHEN COMPLETING TASKS
- ALWAYS UPDATE DOCUMENTATION WHEN ANYTHING BECOMES OUTDATED OR THERE IS NEW INFORMATION
- KEEP AGENT-REFERENCE.MD UPDATED FOR ANY NEW OR RELEVANT INFORMATION FOR YOURSELF TO WORK BETWEEN CONTEXTS
- IN LIEU OF MAKING NEW DOCUMENTATION FILES IN-BETWEEN PHASES PLEASE ONLY UPDATE AND LOG PROGRESS IN PROGRESS-LOG.MD
- WHEN FINISHED WITH SET OF TASKS AND AFTER UPDATING TODO.TXT, PUT A NEW PROMPT FOR THE NEXT CHAT CONTEXT IN NEW-PROMPT.MD TO CONTINUE WORKING ON THE NEXT SET OF TASKS.
